channel.title: Server Keeps Crashing
channel.description:
Hi after about 5 -10 seconds of my server being on i get this error and all the players get disconnected.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.berserk(client.java:228) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:28463) at client.process(client.java:17254) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:55)[/code]

item.title: Server Keeps Crashing
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

Well, check over that stuff and make sure that you didn’t miss any little detail that will crash the server on runtime. Something like this isn’t able to be detected by the compiler and will cause problems on runtime, so look in your run() voids for anything you my have edited or your main(string[] args) void for anything there.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Keeps Crashing
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Xp rates and some commands

I made a 99smith command and changed teh xp rate on smithing and herblore and farming.

item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

What was the last thing that you edited on your server?
